GameData:
-
-
The Great Fairy Alliance -
Fairy Alliance -
Fairy -
All hail Cirno! All hail the strongest and smartest of the fairies![NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Fairies are everywhere in Gensokyo: simple, carefree spirits of nature and seasons who spend their days playing games, pulling pranks on humans, dressing up in silly costumes, or goofing off with their magical powers. When an incident occurs and shrine maidens and magicians start careening through the sky blasting everything, fairies shout "I wanna play too!" and leap into the air, joyously spraying danmaku everywhere. Then they get shot, explode, reassemble a few seconds later, and dash a bit further ahead on the path to do it again! Their childish sense of joy and carefree nature causes most of the humans and youkai of Gensokyo to not take fairies seriously, regarding them as silly at best, nuisances at worst.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Well, you're gonna put a stop to that! It's high time fairies got some respect around here, and as the strongest fairy, you're just the one to see it happen! Will the youkai cower in fear at your armies that never stay dead, or will the humans ooh and aah at the beauty of your ice sculptures and nature art? To build a civilization that will stand the test of time, everything is 1, 2, 9!
-
The Great Fairy Alliance -
Made up, as the name implies, of fairies of all shapes and sizes from around Gensokyo, the Great Fairy Alliance can at times look less like a civilization and more like... like just a random gaggle of fairies that keep happening to run into each other. One might think that a society composed of immortal beings, like fairies are, would accumulate experience and expertise much faster than mortal societies and as such skyrocket ahead of their peers in technological, cultural, and military advancement. However, fairies spend almost all their time playing around and trying to directly command them for any length of time is like herding cats with attention-deficit disorder, so it all balances out. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE] The Alliance is led by Cirno, the self-proclaimed strongest fairy, but not alone: she often gets assistance from her fairy or non-fairy friends, treating the task of leading a civilization as a creative group activity. With assistance from her friends, the youkai firefly Wriggle Nightbug, youkai sparrow Mystia Lorelei, and youkai something-or-other Rumia, the Great Fairy Alliance hopes to bring respect to fairies, bugs, small birds, and whatever-Rumia-ises. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]The secret of the Alliance, reflecting either great wisdom or great luck on Cirno's part, is that their society is structured in such a way as to accommodate fairies' childishness; leaving important projects open for them to work on whenever it looks like fun. And really: if someone else conquers most of the planet, or launches a mission to the Moon, or creates a culture that will define the arc of history, and the fairies don't because they were spending too much time having fun... aren't they the real winners?
-
Crayons -
Crayons are art utensils made of colored paraffin, beeswax, charcoal, or other material. They are usually safe, non-toxic, cheap, and easy to work with, making them ideal for art projects for children and childlike fairies. They are generated only by the Great Fairy Alliance's Art Center unique building.
-
Cirno feminine
-
Cirno -
Ice Fairy Of The Lake -
Unnatural Chill -
Nine-Ball -
TH06 ~ TH12.8 -
About -
The strongest fairy (she is powerful enough to be a stage 2 boss) as well as the smartest fairy (she can read and knows what fractions are), Cirno is the big metaphorical fish in a very, very small metaphorical pond. Her hobbies mostly center around freezing things with her ice powers and playing with them -- especially flowers and frogs, the latter of which thaw out and start hopping again two thirds of the time! Older beyond her looks and far less wise than her years, Cirno often gets into fights out of boredom or to prove she is, indeed, the strongest. After her house was destroyed by the Three Mischevious Fairies Sunny Milk, Luna Child and Star Sapphire, Cirno got the idea to bring the fairies together to prove the humans shouldn't take them lightly. She often forgets she's leading a civilization and just plays around with her ice powers, but that's okay, because her fairies often forget they're supposed to be a civilization. -
Cirno's Friends -
Daiyousei ('Big Fairy') [NEWLINE] Lily White (Fairy of Spring) [NEWLINE] Sunny Milk (Fairy of Light) [NEWLINE] Luna Child (Fairy of Sound) [NEWLINE] Star Sapphire (Fairy of Motion) [NEWLINE] Wriggle Nightbug (Youkai Firefly) [NEWLINE] Mystia Lorelei (Youkai Sparrow) [NEWLINE] Rumia (Youkai of Darkness) [NEWLINE] Letty Whiterock (Yuki-Onna Of Winter)
-
Doubles production speed and upkeep cost of land and naval units. -
Great Fairy Wars
-
Spring Herald -
Announces the coming of spring with a shower of danmaku bullets, blasting anyone not quick enough to get out of the way. It has an extended range of 2 hexes, unlike the Gatling Gun, which it replaces. --
The joyous tradition of announcing spring with a spray of bullets began with the fairy Lily White, who became known for doing so no matter what kind of incident or duel she was jumping into. Since spring followed Lily White wherever she went, she had a lot of heralding to do, a job she leapt into with gusto! Spring Heralds love their jobs as much as Lily does, and even on turns when they don't attack anything, they are still spraying off pretty danmaku patterns into empty sky. --
The Spring Herald is Cirno's unique unit, replacing the Gatling Gun. Normally, an empire using ranged units like Archers and Crossbowmen for its city garrisons must reduce the range at which those garrisons can defend the city when they modernize their units with Industrialization. The Spring Herald has no such drawback, allowing it to defend as ably as it did before, combining the range of the Crossbowman with the firepower of the Gatling Gun!
-
Great Fairy Warriors -
The good news is, fairies don't die, so your fairy ground and naval units build at double speed. The bad news is, fairies have short attention spans, so you have to spend twice as much to keep their units active. -
Cirno's fairies can re-arm military units faster than anyone, because any "dead" unit can just come back to base and get some more weapons or paper boats. The bonus doesn't apply to planes, because you still have to rebuild a whole plane and that takes a long time. -
You can scare up an army faster than anyone, so you can join, start, or defend against a war at the drop of a hat. Just end it decisively before upkeep costs bankrupt you!

Ah-ha! I told you guys there was a weirdo around here! Hello, weirdo. I'm Cirno! -
I'm Cirno! I'm the ice fairy who can pound nails in with a banana! Who are you and what do YOU do with fruit? -
Hello there! I'm Cirno, and I'm the boss of these fairies, because I'm the strongest!
Boo! Booooo! -
...What was I doing? -
Grrr... -
You're playing with fire, buddy. And you forget that ice melts fire!
-
Check it out! That's why I'm the strongest! -
Now you know not to take fairies so lightly!
-
Owowowowowow! -
Okay, okay, uncle, uncle!
-
Noooo! What have you done, you foolish child? I'm melting, meeelllllting! Oh, what a world, what a world! -
You may think you have defeated me, but you just fell into my cunning trap! Secret Fairy Ninja Ambush Team! ...Did any fairies come out? No? I got nothin', then. -
That's okay. I was bored of being a civilization leader anyway. I'm gonna throw snowballs at Suwako's shrine!
-
Huh? Where'd you come from? -
Oh, hello there. -
Hello again! Come back to play with us fairies some more?
-
Seeya. -
Shoo! I'm doing important fairy business.
-
I'll take it!
-
Hmm, nah. -
I'm not getting enough stuff. -
I'm giving away too much for that! -
Maybe for a little more...
-
No way.
-
What? Oh, okay, I think I have some stuff for you.
-
No, I'm not giving you that!
-
Hey, can we trade resources? If I make 20 trades, then I get a free one! -
I kinda froze some of our supplies and I need replacements before Daiyousei finds out. -
Want to trade? Trade one luxury, get a free fried lamprey, guaranteed to cure night blindness! Mystia makes 'em. -
Say, can we open our borders? It's dumb to have to keep track of where we're not allowed to fly around.
-
I kinda froze some of our supplies and I need replacements before Daiyousei finds out.
-
Okay. -
Alright.
-
Nine! I mean, nein! -
No.
-
Fairies invented snow cones! You can mix in fruit juice for flavor, but I like the 'plain' kind the best. -
You can freeze a whole field of flowers and then lay on them like a bed! But don't fall asleep in the sun, or they'll melt.
-
Hey, it's my favorite big person! -
Oh, hello again! Want a frogsicle? -
There you are! I was hoping you'd come back. We made you a waterslide, but half of it melted.
-
See ya! -
Laters!
-
Sure thing!
-
I need some more. -
Eh, you can do better. -
Just a smidge more?
-
No can do, pal.
-
Take, we were barely using it!
-
Hey! If you think you can take advantage of me just because I'm a fairy you got another think comin'!
-
Oh, this would be great for Lily's thing collection! She collects... some kind of things, and this is a thing, it's perfect!
-
Hey, did you know that it's impossible to kiss your own elbow? Because long story short, Letty did, and now I need to pay off a pretty big bet with her.
-
Great!
-
No, sorry. -
Nah.
-
Do you know why kappa love cucumbers so much? I tried one once, didn't seem that great. I want to spread a rumor that fairies like ice cream, so everyone who goes into the woods will carry some! -
Fishing is too much work. Why do they keep throwing out one worm at a time on a string? Just keep all the worms in the boat, make the fish come to you!
-
Oh, as soon as the big thing disappears, this small thing appears. What do you want? -
You again? Shouldn't you have fallen in a hole by now? -
Oh great, as if I didn't have enough to deal with now that Wriggle's bugs are on strike, now you show up!
-
Buzz off. -
Scram!
-
That's a fair deal. Wait, aren't we supposed to be mad at each other? Or am I thinking of someone else?
-
I'm not going to be that generous for you! -
Ha ha, very funny, what's your real offer? -
No. This is completely unfair. -
I need more than that.
-
What, you think I'm some kind of moron who would take that deal? The real moron is you!
-
Fine. Fine! Take it. I didn't want it anyway.
-
The only tribute you get from me is a giant ice ball, right in your stupid face!
-
Oh man, I just had the best idea, but I need some of this from you. And if you know where I can find eight tons of confetti, that would be great too.
-
I need this stuff. I'm making a giant, mobile snowman. Give me the parts I need, and it will conquer you last!
-
Yeah, whatever.
-
Pffffft. -
No. -
Nine! I mean, nein!
-
If you're going to pickle veggies, do it before you eat them! But you don't have to pickle a rock. -
Not many fairies know about this, but if you set out just at the crack of dawn, when the animals are still asleep, and you head due north into the forest, going as fast as you can, for a whole hour... you get completely lost! -
According to Wriggle, insects can sing any kind of song! Except they can't do the vocals, so they mostly have to be the backup.
-
Are you moving your armies in to start a fight with me? Because fairies never back down from a fight! We might forget what we were doing or get bored and wander off, but we don't back down! -
Quit founding new cities where I want to go! It's hard enough to get a bunch of fairies to lug around enough supplies to start a town, now I have to tell them the spot they wanted is taken?
-
No youkai, god, or army scares me! I'll show you that recklessness is bravery! Attack! -
I challenge your civilization to danmaku battle! Fairies will fill the sky with bullets! -
It's time I cleaned the weaklings and the weirdos out of here, starting with you!
-
You want to challenge Cirno, the freezer of crybabies? Bring it on! -
Hahaha! I'll freeze you solid! -
If it's a fight you want, I'll be happy to oblige!
-
...
